summary: Sequel to the 2002 film. This time, Heavyweight Champ George "Iceman" Chambers is sent to a Russian Jail on trumped-up drug charges.
cast: Michael Jai White|Scott Adkins|Ben Cross|Eli Danker|Mark Ivanir|Ken Lerner|Daisy Lang|Silvio Simac|Ivaylo Geraskov|Valentin Ganev|Atanas Srebrev|Michail Elenov|Velizar Binev|George Zlatarev|Ruslan Kupenov|Raicho Vasilev|Nikolai Sotirov|Dian Hristov|Trayan Milenov-Troy|Emil Markov|Panayot Tzanev|Hristo Mitzkov|Maria Ilieva|Ioan Banzourkov|Violeta Markovska|Diyan Machev|Anatoli Nechev|Stanimir Stamatov|Radoslav Parvanov|George Karlukovski|Danko Jordanov|Dimiter Doichinov|Borislav Iliev|Velizar Peev|Krassimir Simeonov|Anthony Pezzolanti|Stefan Shterev

title: Invicto 2
